com.ibm.streamsx.json.converters

Class JSONToTupleConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.streamsx.json.converters.JSONToTupleConverter

  • public class JSONToTupleConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts JSON values to SPL tuples and SPL tuple attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • setPrefixToIgnore

        public static void setPrefixToIgnore(java.lang.String value)

      • jsonToAttribute

        public static java.lang.Object jsonToAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                                               com.ibm.streams.operator.Type type,
                                               java.lang.Object jsonObj,
                                               com.ibm.streams.operator.Type parentType)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert JSON value to an SPL tuple attribute value.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the attribute being converted (used for logging purposes).
        type - SPL attribute type that the JSON value is being converted to.
        jsonObj - JSON value that is being converted (can be either JSONObject or JSONArray).
        parentType - This parameter is used when converting arrays or maps to an SPL tuple attribute. For all other JSON types, can be set to null.
        Returns:
        Value converted to SPL representation with type type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there was a problem converting the JSON.

      • jsonToTuple

        public static com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple jsonToTuple(com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject jbase,
                                                         com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamSchema schema)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert a JSONObject to an SPL tuple with the specified schema. The SPL schema must contain attribute names that match the JSON key names in the JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        jbase - JSON value that is being converted
        schema - Schema of the SPL tuple
        Returns:
        Value converted to SPL tuple with the specified schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there was a problem converting the JSONObject.

      • jsonToAtributeMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> jsonToAtributeMap(com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject jbase,
                                                                                 com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamSchema schema)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert a JSONObject to an Map. The specified schema must contain attribute names that match the JSON key names in the JSONObject. The key values of the returned map will match the names of the attributes contained in the schema.
        Parameters:
        jbase - JSON value that is being converted.
        schema - Schema containing attribute names that will be used as the key values of the map.
        Returns:
        Value converted to a Map<String, Object>.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there was a problem converting the JSONObject.
